content.text: The following documents, in whole or in part, are normatively referenced in this document and are  indispensable for its application. For dated references, only the edition cited applies. For undated references,  the latest edition of the referenced document (including any amendments) applies.
EN 124:1994 1), Gully tops and manhole tops for vehicular and pedestrian areas - Design requirements, type  testing, marking, quality control

1) To be replaced by series EN 124, which is at draft stage.
